subject: Al Khalifa Finance House.
body:
Al Khalifa Finance House.
OFFICE ADDRESS:15th Floor Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.
Greetings,
My name's are,  Mr ABOOB MOHAMMED  Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House.
We are offering Corporate and Personal Loan at 3% Interest Rate for a
duration of 5 to 15 years. We also pay  1.3% commission to brokers who
introduce project owners for finance or other opportunities. I will
give you more details upon  the receipt of your response to prove
myself and the office.
Best Regards,
ABOOB MOHAMMED
Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House
15th Floor, Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.

subject: Re:   Al Khalifa Finance House.
body:
Hello Mr. ABOOB MOHAMMED,

Thank you for reaching out and introducing yourself. I'm intrigued by your offer of Corporate and Personal Loans. Could you please provide more details about the terms and conditions? For instance, what is the interest rate you're offering? And could you clarify what you mean by "duration of to years"?

Also, I'm curious about the commission for brokers who introduce project owners for finance. How does that work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Marilyn,

I wish to acknowledged the receipt of your mail and it's content.

We are Al Khalifa Finance House Company with a registered office in
Manama, the kingdom of Bahrain.

We are independent financial advisors offering high quality and
independent financial services for the gulf region residents and
expatriates living abroad, we also provide a broad range of services
to both commercial and private clients. As a major Bahrain loan firm,
we serve local, regional, national and international clients.

At this point we only specialized in providing Loans at a 3% interest
rate for the duration of 5 to 15 years.  We are capable of handling
any kind of project hence it’s not over our limit/Maximum funding.

Our terms and conditions:

1. Our Minimum Funding: U$1 Million and our Maximum Funding is: U$6.5 Billion

2. INVESTMENT PERIOD: - 5 to 15 Years + 2 years Grace Period.

3. Interest Rate Per Annum: - 3% per annum interest

4. Capital Repayment Period: - balloon payment at the end of the 5 or
15-year period.

5. Interest Payment: - At the end of each year starting after the
Grace Period of Two Years.

6. Grace Period: - Minimum of 24 Months, which will be the Construction Period.

7. Security/Guarantee.: - Insurance Credit Wrap/ Insurance Surety
Bond. Customers are required to procure an insurance security wrap
with our issuer, which will serve as the only security to the funds we
are given out hence he or she does not reside or operate from the gulf
region.

We also pay 1.3% commission to brokers who introduce project owners
for finance or other opportunities.

To enable us to proceed kindly provide us with your business plan or
an executive summary for our review verification and approval.

Thanks for your understanding and cooperation, I will be waiting for
your kind response.
Best Regards,

ABOOB MOHAMMED
Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House
www.alkhalifafinh.com
15th Floor, Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.

subject: KYC FORM
body:
You are required to fill the attached Questionnaire (KYC) and send
back to us for study.Upon the receipt of the filled KYC, we shall move
to the next phase below.Thereafter, I shall instruct our Attorney {
Lucio Santus Sagari of Lucio Santus & Associates} to draft an
Agreement which copy shall be forwarded to you for review and approval
before affixing our signatures. The said Agreement shall serve as our
security platform and indicate Terms and Conditions of the
transaction. Once we observe these protocols as mentioned above, the
holding bank will initiate the transfer of funds into any of your bank
account designated worldwide.

Waiting for your kind and considerate response on above
Best Regards,

ABOOB MOHAMMED
Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House
www.alkhalifafinh.com
15th Floor, Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.

subject: Re: KYC FORM
body:
Hello ABOOB MOHAMMED,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the detailed information about the next steps. However, I have a few questions before we proceed.

Could you please explain what KYC is and why it's necessary? Also, could you provide more details about the Agreement that Attorney Lucio Santus Sagari will draft? What kind of terms and conditions can I expect to see in this agreement?

I'm also curious about the transfer process. How does the holding bank initiate the transfer of funds? Is there any fee associated with this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Aboob Mohammed,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's great to hear about the services that Al Khalifa Finance House provides. I'm particularly interested in the loan services you mentioned.

Could you please elaborate more on the process of procuring an insurance security wrap? Also, could you provide some examples of projects that your company has funded in the past?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Marilyn,

I wish to acknowledged the receipt of your mail and it's content.

Please I want you to re-read my previous email message sent to you in
case if you do not understand my proposal very well, because I believe
that I have already explained myself and the Loan process in my
earlier message to you.

Meanwhile, the number 7. Security/Guarantee.: - Insurance Credit Wrap/
Insurance Surety Bond. Customers are required to procure an insurance
security wrap with our issuer, which will serve as the only security
to the funds we are given out hence he or she does not reside or
operate from the gulf region. This means that customer will have to
pay a little money from his or her pocket to qualify for a Loan from
this facilities.

Therefore, you are advised to re-read my previous message and fill the
KYC form sent to you for review and approval before affixing our
signatures.

We are waiting for your affirmative response

Best Regards,

ABOOB MOHAMMED
Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House
www.alkhalifafinh.com
15th Floor, Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



We are Al Khalifa Finance House Company with a registered office in
Manama, the kingdom of Bahrain.

We are independent financial advisors offering high quality and
independent financial services for the gulf region residents and
expatriates living abroad, we also provide a broad range of services
to both commercial and private clients. As a major Bahrain loan firm,
we serve local, regional, national and international clients.

At this point we only specialized in providing Loans at a 3% interest
rate for the duration of 5 to 15 years.  We are capable of handling
any kind of project hence it’s not over our limit/Maximum funding.

Our terms and conditions:

1. Our Minimum Funding: U$1 Million and our Maximum Funding is: U$6.5 Billion

2. INVESTMENT PERIOD: - 5 to 15 Years + 2 years Grace Period.

3. Interest Rate Per Annum: - 3% per annum interest

4. Capital Repayment Period: - balloon payment at the end of the 5 or
15-year period.

5. Interest Payment: - At the end of each year starting after the
Grace Period of Two Years.

6. Grace Period: - Minimum of 24 Months, which will be the Construction Period.

7. Security/Guarantee.: - Insurance Credit Wrap/ Insurance Surety
Bond. Customers are required to procure an insurance security wrap
with our issuer, which will serve as the only security to the funds we
are given out hence he or she does not reside or operate from the gulf
region.

We also pay 1.3% commission to brokers who introduce project owners
for finance or other opportunities.

To enable us to proceed kindly provide us with your business plan or
an executive summary for our review verification and approval.

Thanks for your understanding and cooperation, I will be waiting for
your kind response.
Best Regards,

ABOOB MOHAMMED
Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House
www.alkhalifafinh.com
15th Floor, Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Aboob Mohammed,

Thank you for your detailed email. I appreciate the time you took to explain everything so thoroughly. I must admit, some of the terms and processes are a bit complex for me.

Could you please clarify what an Insurance Credit Wrap and Insurance Surety Bond are? Also, could you explain how they serve as security for the funds?

You mentioned that customers will have to pay a little money from their pocket to qualify for a loan. Could you provide more details about this? How much is this amount typically?

Lastly, could you tell me more about the process of procuring an insurance security wrap with your issuer? What does it involve?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Marilyn,

I wish to acknowledged the receipt of your mail and it's content.
However, the Insurance Credit Wrap and Insurance Surety Bond required
are the Security guard between the company and the clients whom apply
for a Loan from this office, hence he or she does not reside or
operate from the gulf region to present a collateral, and that is the
money customers will have to pay from their personal pocket to qualify
for a loan and the charges is just 0.01% of the total amount of Loan
you apply from this facilities.

Therefore, I will advise you to kindly fill up the KYC FORM sent to
you and returned it back to us  for our review verification and
approvals.

We are waiting for your affirmative response.
Best Regards,

ABOOB MOHAMMED
Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House
www.alkhalifafinh.com
15th Floor, Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Aboob Mohammed,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your patience in explaining the process to me.

I understand that the Insurance Credit Wrap and Insurance Surety Bond are necessary for securing a loan from your company, especially since I'm not based in the gulf region. It's good to know that these measures are in place to protect both parties involved.

However, I have a few more questions if you don't mind. Could you please explain what exactly is included in the KYC Form? Also, could you provide more details about how much I would need to pay out of pocket for these insurance requirements?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Aboob Mohammed,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the Insurance Credit Wrap and Insurance Surety Bond. It's interesting to learn how these measures serve as a security guard between the company and clients applying for loans.

I'm curious, could you please explain more about how the charges are calculated? You mentioned it's just of the total amount of loan applied from this office. Could you clarify that?

Also, regarding the KYC form, I'd like to understand more about what information is required in this form and why it's necessary. 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Marilyn,

Thanks for your email and your kind gesture and understanding. The
Insurance Wrap payment is just at the rate of 0.01% base on the total
amount of loan you would need to apply from this company.

Therefore, you are advised to indicate how much loan you will need to
secure from this facilities , and also fill up the KYC FORM sent to
you according to your available Information's and tips unavailable
ones mark, then returned it back to us for our review and approval, so
that I will know how much you would need to pay for the Insurance
Credit Wrap and Insurance Surety Bond fee payment.

Thanks for your understanding and cooperation, I will be waiting for
your kind response.
Best Regards,

ABOOB MOHAMMED
Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House
www.alkhalifafinh.com
15th Floor, Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Aboob Mohammed,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information you've provided about the KYC form and the loan process at Al Khalifa Finance House.

Could you please provide me with more details about this Insurance Wrap? What exactly does it cover and how is the payment calculated?

Also, could you explain a bit more about how the loan amount affects this insurance wrap payment? I'm trying to understand all aspects of this process before making any decisions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Marilyn

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Marilyn,

I was wondering how many times I will have to explained the issues
regarding the payment of Insurance Wrap, and every other related
Information about this loan process,  If you are interested in our
loan all you need to send your business plan and we proceed.

We are waiting for your affirmative response
Best Regards,

ABOOB MOHAMMED
Director, Credit and Loan
Al Khalifa Finance House
www.alkhalifafinh.com
15th Floor, Almoayyed Tower 2504, Seef 428, Bahrain.

subject: Re: Details of the Loan
body:
Hello Aboob Mohammed,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your patience in explaining the process to me. I'm still trying to understand the details of the Insurance Wrap and how it relates to the loan process.

Could you please elaborate more on what exactly an Insurance Wrap is? Also, could you provide some more information about how it affects my loan application?

I have a business plan ready, but before sending it over, I would like to fully comprehend all aspects of this loan process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Marilyn
